infos.value: Have we failed? Even with our numbers?
What are you saying? This is our best opportunity to rid ourselves of the bandits!
Did I not make myself clear? I'm telling you that I'm tired.
This freezing-cold rain has soaked me to the bone. And this needlessly long fight has left my legs stiff as planks.
Are you certain? If we let them off so easily...
That's no concern of mine. I'm a princess of Hourne. Is this the hospitality Leonis has to offer?
Hahaha. Then let us withdraw to a warm hearth.
Enjoy this victory while it lasts.
For it is not over yet. On the contrary, it has only just begun...
